Description: Fragment of foot with concave outer face of Attic black-glazed pottery kylix; glazed black on top, underside and lowest part of outside; reserved: outer face of foot and resting surface; scraped groove on underside of foot; inscription cut on underside
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXIV, no. 501)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 673, no. 317)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.1513)
